name: DiceWatchRandomizer-(Overwatch2)
0:
”Alexa, ask dice watch randomizer to give me a hero to play”
”Alexa, ask dice watch randomizer to pick a random tank hero”
”Alexa, ask dice watch randomizer to choose a random role for me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dice watch randomizer
des:
DiceWatch Randomizer is a fun way to roulette your matches with a bit of randomness.

Have the randomizer pick a random hero for you from any role. The randomizer can also specify to give you a hero from a specific role (Tank, Damage, Support). If you are unsure what role you want to play, feel free to ask! 

NOTE: This Alexa Skill is not for monetary gain and in no way represents or is supported by Blizzard Entertainment. This is free to use, just for fun.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
